# cook your dish here
t = int(input())
ret = []
while t>0:
 t -= 1
 n = int(input())
 s = input()
 arr = list(map(int,input().split(' ')))
 l = []
 f = True
 for i in range(len(arr)):
  if s[i]=='1':
   if f:
    fr = i
    f = False
   l.append(i)
 
 r = []
 for i in range(1,len(l)):
  r.append([l[i-1],l[i]])
 
 # i = fr+1
 ans = 0
 for a in r:
  x = a[0]
  i = x+1
  y = a[1]
  curr = arr[i]-arr[x]
  while i<=y:
   if arr[i]-arr[i-1]>curr:
    curr = arr[i]-arr[i-1]
   i += 1
  ans += abs(arr[y]-arr[x])
  ans -= curr
 ans += arr[fr]-arr[0]
 ans += arr[len(arr)-1]-arr[l[len(l)-1]]
 
 ret.append(ans)
for i in ret:
 print(i)
